+0000","feedId":44,"bgimg":"https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/9/9b/Do-Dirty-Keto-Step-1-Version-2.jpg/aid12084841-v4-728px-Do-Dirty-Keto-Step-1-Version-2.jpg","linkMd5":"fe452af5c01fdaaf5c00ed997a50fa6c","bgimgJsdelivr":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx2/cdn60@2020_5/2020/09/16/05-03-48-084_b0c36c5dcd51c881.webp","destWidth":728,"destHeight":546,"sourceBytes":73526,"destBytes":34544,"author":"","articleImgCdnMap":{"https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/9/9b/Do-Dirty-Keto-Step-1-Version-2.jpg/aid12084841-v4-728px-Do-Dirty-Keto-Step-1-Version-2.jpg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx2/cdn60@2020_5/2020/09/16/05-03-48-084_b0c36c5dcd51c881.webp","https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/e/e2/Do-Dirty-Keto-Step-2.jpg/aid12084841-v4-728px-Do-Dirty-Keto-Step-2.jpg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx10/cdn80@2020_6/2020/09/16/05-04-08-846_0a92616c45b1cfe9.webp","https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/6/6e/Do-Dirty-Keto-Step-3.jpg/aid12084841-v4-728px-Do-Dirty-Keto-Step-3.jpg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx21/cdn23@2020_4/2020/09/16/05-04-13-207_6b8f8abd31f8ae3d.webp","https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/1/15/Do-Dirty-Keto-Step-4.jpg/aid12084841-v4-728px-Do-Dirty-Keto-Step-4.jpg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx18/cdn19@2020_4/2020/09/16/05-04-07-234_c8112d7807ecef4c.webp","https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/8/83/Do-Dirty-Keto-Step-5.jpg/aid12084841-v4-728px-Do-Dirty-Keto-Step-5.jpg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx3/cdn64@2020_4/2020/09/16/05-04-07-494_b93fe06cb791c681.webp","https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/b/b0/Do-Dirty-Keto-Step-6.jpg/aid12084841-v4-728px-Do-Dirty-Keto-Step-6.jpg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx7/cdn72@2020_2/2020/09/16/05-04-09-470_bd6de45b34d6034d.webp","https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/b/ba/Do-Dirty-Keto-Step-7-Version-2.jpg/aid12084841-v4-728px-Do-Dirty-Keto-Step-7-Version-2.jpg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx7/cdn34@2020_3/2020/09/16/05-04-06-226_99dc32a78c641be1.webp","https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/2/23/Do-Dirty-Keto-Step-8.jpg/aid12084841-v4-728px-Do-Dirty-Keto-Step-8.jpg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx32/cdn60@2020_1/2020/09/16/05-04-09-280_1761e087692b7461.webp","https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/5/56/Do-Dirty-Keto-Step-9.jpg/aid12084841-v4-728px-Do-Dirty-Keto-Step-9.jpg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx24/cdn97@2020_6/2020/09/16/05-04-12-919_042df221a8540061.webp","https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/4/40/Do-Dirty-Keto-Step-10.jpg/aid12084841-v4-728px-Do-Dirty-Keto-Step-10.jpg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx11/cdn4@2020_2/2020/09/16/05-04-07-964_f7ff53c91f2ebb88.webp","https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/c/c6/Do-Dirty-Keto-Step-11.jpg/aid12084841-v4-728px-Do-Dirty-Keto-Step-11.jpg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx21/cdn11@2020_1/2020/09/16/05-04-12-250_032475031534b1e5.webp","https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/d/d8/Do-Dirty-Keto-Step-12-Version-2.jpg/aid12084841-v4-728px-Do-Dirty-Keto-Step-12-Version-2.jpg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx7/cdn4@2020_4/2020/09/16/05-04-12-617_4e1aa3f9203bacbd.webp","https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/4/44/Do-Dirty-Keto-Step-13.jpg/aid12084841-v4-728px-Do-Dirty-Keto-Step-13.jpg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx33/cdn78@2020_3/2020/09/16/05-04-06-223_668672dd22d3c009.webp"},"publishedOrCreatedDate":1600232627606},{"createdTime":"2020-09-16 13:03:47","updatedTime":"2020-09-16 13:03:47","title":"How to Build Your Personal Brand","link":"https://www.wikihow.com/Build-Your-Personal-Brand","description":"<div class=\"mw-parser-output\">\n <p>A personal brand is much more than just the products or services that you’re selling. For instance, when you think of Oprah Winfrey, chances are you don’t think of her as just a talk show host. With a magazine, a book club, beauty products, and even her own TV channel, she’s come to be known for a multitude of things, all of which embody her personality and values. That’s what a successful personal brand looks like. It’s memorable, genuine, and tells a compelling story that speaks to its audience. With hard work and engagement, you can build your own successful brand that reflects who you are and what you have to offer. </p> \n <h2><span class=\"mw-editsection\"><span class=\"mw-editsection-bracket\">[</span><a target=\"_blank\" href=\"https://www.wikihow.com/index.php?title=Build-Your-Personal-Brand&amp;action=edit&amp;section=1\" title=\"Edit section: Steps\">Edit</a><span class=\"mw-editsection-bracket\">]</span></span><span class=\"mw-headline\" id=\"Steps\">Steps</span></h2> \n <h3><span class=\"mw-editsection\"><span class=\"mw-editsection-bracket\">[</span><a target=\"_blank\" href=\"https://www.wikihow.com/index.php?title=Build-Your-Personal-Brand&amp;action=edit&amp;section=2\" title=\"Edit section: Defining Your Brand\">Edit</a><span class=\"mw-editsection-bracket\">]</span></span><span class=\"mw-headline\" id=\"Defining-Your-Brand\">Defining Your Brand</span></h3> \n <ol>\n  <li>Choose specific demographics for your target audience. Identify who your target audience for your brand is by thinking about factors such as age, location, gender, income level, education, and ethnic background. Figure out who has a need for your brand and who is most likely to buy and support it.<sup id=\"_ref-1\" class=\"reference\" aria-label=\"Link to Reference 1\"><a target=\"_blank\" href=\"https://www.wikihow.com/Build-Your-Personal-Brand#_note-1\">[1]</a></sup>\n   <div class=\"mwimg  largeimage  floatcenter \" style=\"max-width:728px\">\n    <a target=\"_blank\" href=\"https://www.wikihow.com/Image:Build-Your-Personal-Brand-Step-1-Version-5.jpg\" class=\"image\"><img alt=\"Build Your Personal Brand Step 1 Version 5.jpg\" src=\"https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/7/70/Build-Your-Personal-Brand-Step-1-Version-5.jpg/aid589138-v4-728px-Build-Your-Personal-Brand-Step-1-Version-5.jpg\" decoding=\"async\" width=\"728\" height=\"546\" class=\"whcdn\" /></a>\n   </div> \n   <ul>\n    <li>You can also think about the psychology of your target. For instance, what kind of personality or attitude do the people interested in your brand have?</li> \n    <li>Knowing who your target market is can help you figure out ways to appeal to them and attract newcomers.</li>\n   </ul></li> \n  <li>Focus your message so it appeals to your target audience. Think about who you’re trying to reach or sell your products to. Craft a message and think about what kind of content will market and promote your brand most effectively to your target audience.<sup id=\"_ref-2\" class=\"reference\" aria-label=\"Link to Reference 2\"><a target=\"_blank\" href=\"https://www.wikihow.com/Build-Your-Personal-Brand#_note-2\">[2]</a></sup>\n   <div class=\"mwimg  largeimage  floatcenter \" style=\"max-width:728px\">\n    <a target=\"_blank\" href=\"https://www.wikihow.com/Image:Build-Your-Personal-Brand-Step-2-Version-5.jpg\" class=\"image\"><img alt=\"Build Your Personal Brand Step 2 Version 5.jpg\" src=\"https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/d/d1/Build-Your-Personal-Brand-Step-2-Version-5.jpg/aid589138-v4-728px-Build-Your-Personal-Brand-Step-2-Version-5.jpg\" decoding=\"async\" width=\"728\" height=\"546\" class=\"whcdn\" /></a>\n   </div> \n   <ul>\n    <li>Your personal brand and message need to focus on your target demographic to keep them engaged.</li> \n    <li>For example, if your goal is to appeal to recent college grads, your message could focus more on strategies and challenges around entering the professional workforce. If you’re trying to reach working moms, your message could include ways to deal with family stress or self-care strategies.</li>\n   </ul></li> \n  <li>Research the industry and imitate experts in the field. Spend time reading up on business strategies and information about the industry you’re interested in. Find out who the experts are in your field. Look up their blogs, websites, articles, or anywhere else they’ve contributed their thoughts on the industry. Use their experience to help you build your own brand.<sup id=\"_ref-3\" class=\"reference\" aria-label=\"Link to Reference 3\"><a target=\"_blank\" href=\"https://www.wikihow.com/Build-Your-Personal-Brand#_note-3\">[3]</a></sup>\n   <div class=\"mwimg  largeimage  floatcenter \" style=\"max-width:728px\">\n    <a target=\"_blank\" href=\"https://www.wikihow.com/Image:Build-Your-Personal-Brand-Step-3-Version-5.jpg\" class=\"image\"><img alt=\"Build Your Personal Brand Step 3 Version 5.jpg\" src=\"https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/a/ac/Build-Your-Personal-Brand-Step-3-Version-5.jpg/aid589138-v4-728px-Build-Your-Personal-Brand-Step-3-Version-5.jpg\" decoding=\"async\" width=\"728\" height=\"546\" class=\"whcdn\" /></a>\n   </div> \n   <ul>\n    <li>Even though the goal is to stand out in your industry, it’s important to know the major players in your field.</li> \n    <li>Use the internet to research experts and find resources and information about your field.</li> \n    <li>Find out how an expert you admire started off and became successful in the industry. For instance, if you’re into fitness, you can read interviews and articles about how a fitness model or athlete built their business so you can model your brand after theirs.</li>\n   </ul></li> \n  <li>Create a list of your strengths and weaknesses. A simple way to help define who you and your brand are is to make a list of your personal strengths and weaknesses. Ask yourself questions about what areas of work you excel in, what characteristics other people have complimented you on, as well as which roles and jobs seem to drain you or don’t suit your talents. Brainstorm and write down everything that comes to mind.<sup id=\"_ref-4\" class=\"reference\" aria-label=\"Link to Reference 4\"><a target=\"_blank\" href=\"https://www.wikihow.com/Build-Your-Personal-Brand#_note-4\">[4]</a></sup>\n   <div class=\"mwimg  largeimage  floatcenter \" style=\"max-width:728px\">\n    <a target=\"_blank\" href=\"https://www.wikihow.com/Image:Build-Your-Personal-Brand-Step-4-Version-5.jpg\" class=\"image\"><img alt=\"Build Your Personal Brand Step 4 Version 5.jpg\" src=\"https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/0/04/Build-Your-Personal-Brand-Step-4-Version-5.jpg/aid589138-v4-728px-Build-Your-Personal-Brand-Step-4-Version-5.jpg\" decoding=\"async\" width=\"728\" height=\"546\" class=\"whcdn\" /></a>\n   </div> \n   <ul>\n    <li>Think about what industries, jobs, and challenges motivate or excite you.</li> \n    <li>Use your strengths and weaknesses to help you narrow down industries as well. For instance, if you prefer working on projects by yourself, then you may not want to work in an industry that requires collaboration.</li>\n   </ul></li> \n  <li>Apply your strengths and weaknesses to your personal brand. Take your list of strengths and weaknesses and assess them as they relate to the industry or career that you work in. Find a specific niche in your industry that suits your talents and passion.<sup id=\"_ref-5\" class=\"reference\" aria-label=\"Link to Reference 5\"><a target=\"_blank\" href=\"https://www.wikihow.com/Build-Your-Personal-Brand#_note-5\">[5]</a></sup>\n   <div class=\"mwimg  largeimage  floatcenter \" style=\"max-width:728px\">\n    <a target=\"_blank\" href=\"https://www.wikihow.com/Image:Build-Your-Personal-Brand-Step-5-Version-5.jpg\" class=\"image\"><img alt=\"Build Your Personal Brand Step 5 Version 5.jpg\" src=\"https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/0/00/Build-Your-Personal-Brand-Step-5-Version-5.jpg/aid589138-v4-728px-Build-Your-Personal-Brand-Step-5-Version-5.jpg\" decoding=\"async\" width=\"728\" height=\"546\" class=\"whcdn\" /></a>\n   </div> \n   <ul>\n    <li>For example, clothing design is a massive industry, but if you’re really good at designing t-shirts with abstract art designs, and you love doing it, it could be your niche.</li>\n   </ul></li>\n </ol> \n <h3><span class=\"mw-editsection\"><span class=\"mw-editsection-bracket\">[</span><a target=\"_blank\" href=\"https://www.wikihow.com/index.php?title=Build-Your-Personal-Brand&amp;action=edit&amp;section=3\" title=\"Edit section: Marketing Your Personal Brand\">Edit</a><span class=\"mw-editsection-bracket\">]</span></span><span class=\"mw-headline\" id=\"Marketing-Your-Personal-Brand\">Marketing Your Personal Brand</span></h3> \n <ol>\n  <li>Reflect the beliefs of your brand in your personal life. Separating your personal brand from your personal life can actually make building it more difficult. Instead, live your brand by having your actual lifestyle reflect your brand so it’s more authentic and more appealing.<sup id=\"_ref-6\" class=\"reference\" aria-label=\"Link to Reference 6\"><a target=\"_blank\" href=\"https://www.wikihow.com/Build-Your-Personal-Brand#_note-6\">[6]</a></sup>\n   <div class=\"mwimg  largeimage  floatcenter \" style=\"max-width:728px\">\n    <a target=\"_blank\" href=\"https://www.wikihow.com/Image:Build-Your-Personal-Brand-Step-6-Version-5.jpg\" class=\"image\"><img alt=\"Build Your Personal Brand Step 6 Version 5.jpg\" src=\"https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/4/48/Build-Your-Personal-Brand-Step-6-Version-5.jpg/aid589138-v4-728px-Build-Your-Personal-Brand-Step-6-Version-5.jpg\" decoding=\"async\" width=\"728\" height=\"546\" class=\"whcdn\" /></a>\n   </div> \n   <ul>\n    <li>For instance, if your personal brand focuses on wellness and nutrition, you can make yourself and your brand look more genuine by practicing what you preach and eating well and exercising.</li> \n    <li>Don’t think of your personal brand as just your job functions, but also your personal ideals. If you work in finance, your daily life can reflect your personal philosophies such as kindness or thoughtful leadership.</li>\n   </ul></li> \n  <li>Craft an elevator pitch summary of your brand. An “elevator pitch” is a super-short summary of an idea that can be delivered quickly to anybody who’s interested in hearing about it. Spend some time boiling down your personal brand into a few short, memorable phrases that you can memorize and pitch to someone on short notice and capture their attention.<sup id=\"_ref-7\" class=\"reference\" aria-label=\"Link to Reference 7\"><a target=\"_blank\" href=\"https://www.wikihow.com/Build-Your-Personal-Brand#_note-7\">[7]</a></sup>\n   <div class=\"mwimg  largeimage  floatcenter \" style=\"max-width:728px\">\n    <a target=\"_blank\" href=\"https://www.wikihow.com/Image:Build-Your-Personal-Brand-Step-7-Version-5.jpg\" class=\"image\"><img alt=\"Build Your Personal Brand Step 7 Version 5.jpg\" src=\"https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/a/a8/Build-Your-Personal-Brand-Step-7-Version-5.jpg/aid589138-v4-728px-Build-Your-Personal-Brand-Step-7-Version-5.jpg\" decoding=\"async\" width=\"728\" height=\"546\" class=\"whcdn\" /></a>\n   </div> \n   <ul>\n    <li>Create a summary that reflects the people you serve, the values you embody, and the results you achieve.</li> \n    <li>Tell your audience what you do and what makes you different and exciting. If your personal brand is focused on a vegan lifestyle, you can talk about the health benefits you noticed after cutting out animal products from your life as well as the delicious recipes you’ve discovered.</li> \n    <li>Let’s say you’re a conflict resolution specialist with a focus on mediating corporate disputes. You could say something like, “Hi, I’m Chris Smith, I can fix professional arguments. My experience as a corporate lawyer helps me find compromises that everyone can live with.”</li>\n   </ul></li> \n  <li>Attend networking events to meet potential customers and clients. Look online for local networking events for people related to your industry. Attend the events and talk to as many people as you can to make business connections and increase awareness of your personal brand. Hand out business cards and collect contact information from the people you meet so you can get in touch with them.<sup id=\"_ref-8\" class=\"reference\" aria-label=\"Link to Reference 8\"><a target=\"_blank\" href=\"https://www.wikihow.com/Build-Your-Personal-Brand#_note-8\">[8]</a></sup>\n   <div class=\"mwimg  largeimage  floatcenter \" style=\"max-width:728px\">\n    <a target=\"_blank\" href=\"https://www.wikihow.com/Image:Build-Your-Personal-Brand-Step-8-Version-5.jpg\" class=\"image\"><img alt=\"Build Your Personal Brand Step 8 Version 5.jpg\" src=\"https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/c/c9/Build-Your-Personal-Brand-Step-8-Version-5.jpg/aid589138-v4-728px-Build-Your-Personal-Brand-Step-8-Version-5.jpg\" decoding=\"async\" width=\"728\" height=\"546\" class=\"whcdn\" /></a>\n   </div> \n   <ul>\n    <li><a target=\"_blank\" href=\"https://www.wikihow.com/Design-an-Effective-Business-Card\" title=\"Design an Effective Business Card\">Designing a good-looking business card</a> is an easy, simple, and quick way to pass along your contact info and give people a good idea of what your brand represents.</li> \n    <li>Accept invitations from other people in your industry to attend networking events as well.</li> \n    <li>Don’t worry if you get nervous! Think of the event as potential job opportunities. Just be professional, polite, and tell people a bit about who you are.</li>\n   </ul></li> \n  <li>Keep an up-to-date list of your contacts for future marketing. Create a spreadsheet or a list of business contacts and potential clients. Whenever you meet a new contact or you get someone’s business card, add it to your list or spreadsheet so you can reach out to them for potential marketing or to use their services.<sup id=\"_ref-9\" class=\"reference\" aria-label=\"Link to Reference 9\"><a target=\"_blank\" href=\"https://www.wikihow.com/Build-Your-Personal-Brand#_note-9\">[9]</a></sup>\n   <div class=\"mwimg  largeimage  floatcenter \" style=\"max-width:728px\">\n    <a target=\"_blank\" href=\"https://www.wikihow.com/Image:Build-Your-Personal-Brand-Step-9-Version-5.jpg\" class=\"image\"><img alt=\"Build Your Personal Brand Step 9 Version 5.jpg\" src=\"https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/4/4e/Build-Your-Personal-Brand-Step-9-Version-5.jpg/aid589138-v4-728px-Build-Your-Personal-Brand-Step-9-Version-5.jpg\" decoding=\"async\" width=\"728\" height=\"546\" class=\"whcdn\" /></a>\n   </div> \n   <ul>\n    <li>Capture their name, email, and try to include any info you have about them. For instance, you could add a note like “John, loves pizza, has a wife and 2 kids.” You can use these details when you talk to them in the future.</li>\n   </ul></li>\n </ol> \n <h3><span class=\"mw-editsection\"><span class=\"mw-editsection-bracket\">[</span><a target=\"_blank\" href=\"https://www.wikihow.com/index.php?title=Build-Your-Personal-Brand&amp;action=edit&amp;section=4\" title=\"Edit section: Growing Your Online Presence\">Edit</a><span class=\"mw-editsection-bracket\">]</span></span><span class=\"mw-headline\" id=\"Growing-Your-Online-Presence\">Growing Your Online Presence</span></h3> \n <ol>\n  <li>Focus on an online platform that suits your interests. Choose a platform that you enjoy using, you’re good at using, and is better suited for your personal brand. Focus on marketing and building an audience on that platform, which is more likely to include people from your target audience.<sup id=\"_ref-10\" class=\"reference\" aria-label=\"Link to Reference 10\"><a target=\"_blank\" href=\"https://www.wikihow.com/Build-Your-Personal-Brand#_note-10\">[10]</a></sup>\n   <div class=\"mwimg  largeimage  floatcenter \" style=\"max-width:728px\">\n    <a target=\"_blank\" href=\"https://www.wikihow.com/Image:Build-Your-Personal-Brand-Step-10-Version-6.jpg\" class=\"image\"><img alt=\"Build Your Personal Brand Step 10 Version 6.jpg\" src=\"https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/c/ca/Build-Your-Personal-Brand-Step-10-Version-6.jpg/aid589138-v4-728px-Build-Your-Personal-Brand-Step-10-Version-6.jpg\" decoding=\"async\" width=\"728\" height=\"546\" class=\"whcdn\" /></a>\n   </div> \n   <ul>\n    <li>For instance, Twitter may be more effective for reaching a broader audience, while Facebook may be more effective for marketing to people who know you.</li> \n    <li>You can also research which platforms are more effective for your industry to help you choose a focus.</li>\n   </ul></li> \n  <li>Make lots of quality content on your platform. Create the best quality content that you can that reflects and promotes your personal brand. Share the content on your platform so your target audience can see and share it.<sup id=\"_ref-11\" class=\"reference\" aria-label=\"Link to Reference 11\"><a target=\"_blank\" href=\"https://www.wikihow.com/Build-Your-Personal-Brand#_note-11\">[11]</a></sup>\n   <div class=\"mwimg  largeimage  floatcenter \" style=\"max-width:728px\">\n    <a target=\"_blank\" href=\"https://www.wikihow.com/Image:Build-Your-Personal-Brand-Step-11-Version-6.jpg\" class=\"image\"><img alt=\"Build Your Personal Brand Step 11 Version 6.jpg\" src=\"https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/e/e3/Build-Your-Personal-Brand-Step-11-Version-6.jpg/aid589138-v4-728px-Build-Your-Personal-Brand-Step-11-Version-6.jpg\" decoding=\"async\" width=\"728\" height=\"546\" class=\"whcdn\" /></a>\n   </div> \n   <ul>\n    <li>For instance, you could live-stream one of your gaming sessions on Facebook live if you’re into video games. If you’re into plants and flowers, you can use Instagram to post beautiful photos of them.</li> \n    <li>Try to post as often as you can to stay engaged with your target audience.</li>\n   </ul></li> \n  <li>Collaborate to create content with other people in your industry. Get in touch with other people who work in your industry and have their own following. Collaborate on a project or make content together that you can share. You’ll trade audiences and grow your own social media following. Everybody wins!<sup id=\"_ref-12\" class=\"reference\" aria-label=\"Link to Reference 12\"><a target=\"_blank\" href=\"https://www.wikihow.com/Build-Your-Personal-Brand#_note-12\">[12]</a></sup>\n   <div class=\"mwimg  largeimage  floatcenter \" style=\"max-width:728px\">\n    <a target=\"_blank\" href=\"https://www.wikihow.com/Image:Build-Your-Personal-Brand-Step-12-Version-6.jpg\" class=\"image\"><img alt=\"Build Your Personal Brand Step 12 Version 6.jpg\" src=\"https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/9/98/Build-Your-Personal-Brand-Step-12-Version-6.jpg/aid589138-v4-728px-Build-Your-Personal-Brand-Step-12-Version-6.jpg\" decoding=\"async\" width=\"728\" height=\"546\" class=\"whcdn\" /></a>\n   </div> \n   <ul>\n    <li>If your brand revolves around fitness, you could get together with another fitness figure, record a workout together, and post it.</li> \n    <li>You could also play fun challenges or games with other content creators. For instance, if you’re into video games, you could challenge another gamer to a duel and broadcast the results.</li>\n   </ul></li> \n  <li>Use LinkedIn as an additional social media tool for your brand. LinkedIn is a social media platform that’s more focused on professional business connections and job searches. Make an account, and focus on highlighting your skills related to your industry. Connect with other people in your industry, participate in group discussions, and reach out to meet new people.<sup id=\"_ref-13\" class=\"reference\" aria-label=\"Link to Reference 13\"><a target=\"_blank\" href=\"https://www.wikihow.com/Build-Your-Personal-Brand#_note-13\">[13]</a></sup>\n   <div class=\"mwimg  largeimage  floatcenter \" style=\"max-width:728px\">\n    <a target=\"_blank\" href=\"https://www.wikihow.com/Image:Build-Your-Personal-Brand-Step-13-Version-6.jpg\" class=\"image\"><img alt=\"Build Your Personal Brand Step 13 Version 6.jpg\" src=\"https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/d/d2/Build-Your-Personal-Brand-Step-13-Version-6.jpg/aid589138-v4-728px-Build-Your-Personal-Brand-Step-13-Version-6.jpg\" decoding=\"async\" width=\"728\" height=\"546\" class=\"whcdn\" /></a>\n   </div> \n   <ul>\n    <li>You can also read and share industry-related articles on LinkedIn.</li> \n    <li>If you’re ever in the market for a new job, the connections you make on LinkedIn can be super valuable tools to help you land one.</li> \n    <li>Use a professional photo for your account so recruiters and industry leaders are more likely to contact or connect with you.</li>\n   </ul></li> \n  <li>Create a Twitter and use it for your brand’s specific niche. Twitter is an expansive platform that you can use to follow leaders in your field and stay relevant in your specific niche. Incorporate your personal brand in your bio and use hashtags that are related to your specific niche. Retweet top industry stories and connect with other people through their accounts.<sup id=\"_ref-14\" class=\"reference\" aria-label=\"Link to Reference 14\"><a target=\"_blank\" href=\"https://www.wikihow.com/Build-Your-Personal-Brand#_note-14\">[14]</a></sup>\n   <div class=\"mwimg  largeimage  floatcenter \" style=\"max-width:728px\">\n    <a target=\"_blank\" href=\"https://www.wikihow.com/Image:Build-Your-Personal-Brand-Step-14-Version-6.jpg\" class=\"image\"><img alt=\"Build Your Personal Brand Step 14 Version 6.jpg\" src=\"https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/f/f6/Build-Your-Personal-Brand-Step-14-Version-6.jpg/aid589138-v4-728px-Build-Your-Personal-Brand-Step-14-Version-6.jpg\" decoding=\"async\" width=\"728\" height=\"546\" class=\"whcdn\" /></a>\n   </div> \n   <ul>\n    <li>For instance, if you’re into collecting, selling, and trading high-end sneakers, you could add hashtags like #sneakerheads, #jordan, #kicks, and #kicksonfire.</li>\n   </ul></li> \n  <li>Read and respond to what your audience is saying online. In addition to creating and posting content, it’s important that you engage with your audience by responding to their comments and messages. You can also use the things they say and post to get an idea about what they’re talking about and are interested in so you can tailor your content to be more relevant.<sup id=\"_ref-15\" class=\"reference\" aria-label=\"Link to Reference 15\"><a target=\"_blank\" href=\"https://www.wikihow.com/Build-Your-Personal-Brand#_note-15\">[15]</a></sup>\n   <div class=\"mwimg  largeimage  floatcenter \" style=\"max-width:728px\">\n    <a target=\"_blank\" href=\"https://www.wikihow.com/Image:Build-Your-Personal-Brand-Step-15-Version-5.jpg\" class=\"image\"><img alt=\"Build Your Personal Brand Step 15 Version 5.jpg\" src=\"https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/5/5f/Build-Your-Personal-Brand-Step-15-Version-5.jpg/aid589138-v4-728px-Build-Your-Personal-Brand-Step-15-Version-5.jpg\" decoding=\"async\" width=\"728\" height=\"546\" class=\"whcdn\" /></a>\n   </div> \n   <ul>\n    <li>For example, if there’s a funny new meme format that people in your audience are sharing, you can tweak it to fit your brand and share your own version to increase engagement.</li>\n   </ul></li>\n </ol> \n <h3><span class=\"mw-editsection\"><span class=\"mw-editsection-bracket\">[</span><a target=\"_blank\" href=\"https://www.wikihow.com/index.php?title=Build-Your-Personal-Brand&amp;action=edit&amp;section=5\" title=\"Edit section: Optimizing Your Website\">Edit</a><span class=\"mw-editsection-bracket\">]</span></span><span class=\"mw-headline\" id=\"Optimizing-Your-Website\">Optimizing Your Website</span></h3> \n <ol>\n  <li>Create a website using a hosting service for easy customization. A website is a super important part of your personal brand because it’s what people will see and how they’ll contact you or purchase something from you. Use a hosting service like Squarespace or Wix, which makes designing your website super simple.<sup id=\"_ref-16\" class=\"reference\" aria-label=\"Link to Reference 16\"><a target=\"_blank\" href=\"https://www.wikihow.com/Build-Your-Personal-Brand#_note-16\">[16]</a></sup>\n   <div class=\"mwimg  largeimage  floatcenter \" style=\"max-width:728px\">\n    <a target=\"_blank\" href=\"https://www.wikihow.com/Image:Build-Your-Personal-Brand-Step-16-Version-5.jpg\" class=\"image\"><img alt=\"Build Your Personal Brand Step 16 Version 5.jpg\" src=\"https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/1/17/Build-Your-Personal-Brand-Step-16-Version-5.jpg/aid589138-v4-728px-Build-Your-Personal-Brand-Step-16-Version-5.jpg\" decoding=\"async\" width=\"728\" height=\"546\" class=\"whcdn\" /></a>\n   </div> \n   <ul>\n    <li>Other popular web hosting services include GoDaddy, Bluehost, and HostGator.</li> \n    <li>You’ll need to pay a subscription fee to keep your website up and running.</li> \n    <li>Choose a domain name that suits your brand. For instance, if you’re into design, you could go with something like “designsbyjulie.com.”</li>\n   </ul></li> \n  <li><a target=\"_blank\" href=\"https://www.wikihow.com/Design-a-Successful-Business-Logo\" title=\"Design a Successful Business Logo\">Design a professional logo</a> for your website. A high-quality logo shows people that you’re serious and your brand is professional. Think about the mood you want your logo to convey and choose a design that communicates your brand to your audience.<sup id=\"_ref-17\" class=\"reference\" aria-label=\"Link to Reference 17\"><a target=\"_blank\" href=\"https://www.wikihow.com/Build-Your-Personal-Brand#_note-17\">[17]</a></sup>\n   <div class=\"mwimg  largeimage  floatcenter \" style=\"max-width:728px\">\n    <a target=\"_blank\" href=\"https://www.wikihow.com/Image:Build-Your-Personal-Brand-Step-17-Version-5.jpg\" class=\"image\"><img alt=\"Build Your Personal Brand Step 17 Version 5.jpg\" src=\"https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/2/2b/Build-Your-Personal-Brand-Step-17-Version-5.jpg/aid589138-v4-728px-Build-Your-Personal-Brand-Step-17-Version-5.jpg\" decoding=\"async\" width=\"728\" height=\"546\" class=\"whcdn\" /></a>\n   </div> \n   <ul>\n    <li>Look at other logos in your industry to get ideas for your own and so you don’t create one that closely resembles the competition.</li> \n    <li>If you need help, consider hiring a professional graphic designer.</li>\n   </ul></li> \n  <li>Use written content and video to craft a brand story. Building a narrative about your personal brand is an effective strategy to expand your audience. Record videos talking about yourself and your brand and post them to your website so people can watch them. Write blog posts and articles so visitors can read and learn more about you and your brand.<sup id=\"_ref-18\" class=\"reference\" aria-label=\"Link to Reference 18\"><a target=\"_blank\" href=\"https://www.wikihow.com/Build-Your-Personal-Brand#_note-18\">[18]</a></sup>\n   <div class=\"mwimg  largeimage  floatcenter \" style=\"max-width:728px\">\n    <a target=\"_blank\" href=\"https://www.wikihow.com/Image:Build-Your-Personal-Brand-Step-18-Version-5.jpg\" class=\"image\"><img alt=\"Build Your Personal Brand Step 18 Version 5.jpg\" src=\"https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/e/ea/Build-Your-Personal-Brand-Step-18-Version-5.jpg/aid589138-v4-728px-Build-Your-Personal-Brand-Step-18-Version-5.jpg\" decoding=\"async\" width=\"728\" height=\"546\" class=\"whcdn\" /></a>\n   </div> \n   <ul>\n    <li>People will feel more invested if they feel like they have a personal connection to your brand.</li>\n   </ul></li> \n  <li>Upload professional photographs of you and your products. Make your website look as good and professional as possible by using high-quality photographs. Hire a photographer or use a high-definition to take professional-looking photos of you and your products. Post the photos on your website for people to see when they visit.<sup id=\"_ref-19\" class=\"reference\" aria-label=\"Link to Reference 19\"><a target=\"_blank\" href=\"https://www.wikihow.com/Build-Your-Personal-Brand#_note-19\">[19]</a></sup>\n   <div class=\"mwimg  largeimage  floatcenter \" style=\"max-width:728px\">\n    <a target=\"_blank\" href=\"https://www.wikihow.com/Image:Build-Your-Personal-Brand-Step-19-Version-5.jpg\" class=\"image\"><img alt=\"Build Your Personal Brand Step 19 Version 5.jpg\" src=\"https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/e/ea/Build-Your-Personal-Brand-Step-19-Version-5.jpg/aid589138-v4-728px-Build-Your-Personal-Brand-Step-19-Version-5.jpg\" decoding=\"async\" width=\"728\" height=\"546\" class=\"whcdn\" /></a>\n   </div> \n   <ul>\n    <li>Low-quality photos can make your brand look unprofessional.</li>\n   </ul></li> \n  <li>Add any testimonials and media features to your website. Whenever a customer, client, or someone in your industry praises you and your work, add it to your website as a testimonial. Link any news articles or media coverage about you or your brand as well. Use them as proof that you can solve other people’s problems and produce quality work.<sup id=\"_ref-20\" class=\"reference\" aria-label=\"Link to Reference 20\"><a target=\"_blank\" href=\"https://www.wikihow.com/Build-Your-Personal-Brand#_note-20\">[20]</a></sup>\n   <div class=\"mwimg  largeimage  floatcenter \" style=\"max-width:728px\">\n    <a target=\"_blank\" href=\"https://www.wikihow.com/Image:Build-Your-Personal-Brand-Step-20-Version-5.jpg\" class=\"image\"><img alt=\"Build Your Personal Brand Step 20 Version 5.jpg\" src=\"https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/7/7d/Build-Your-Personal-Brand-Step-20-Version-5.jpg/aid589138-v4-728px-Build-Your-Personal-Brand-Step-20-Version-5.jpg\" decoding=\"async\" width=\"728\" height=\"546\" class=\"whcdn\" /></a>\n   </div> \n   <ul>\n    <li>For instance, if a customer tells you something like, “Thanks so much! You’re a lifesaver!” ask them if you can share their testimonial on your site.</li> \n    <li>If you’re ever in the news or someone writes about your services, link it to your website so visitors can see it!</li>\n   </ul></li> \n  <li>Entice people to give you their email address for leads. Offer a discount or exclusive content for free in exchange for a visitor’s email address. Collect the emails and use them for future marketing campaigns so you can get the word out to people who have already visited your site and know a little bit about you and your brand.<sup id=\"_ref-21\" class=\"reference\" aria-label=\"Link to Reference 21\"><a target=\"_blank\" href=\"https://www.wikihow.com/Build-Your-Personal-Brand#_note-21\">[21]</a></sup>\n   <div class=\"mwimg  largeimage  floatcenter \" style=\"max-width:728px\">\n    <a target=\"_blank\" href=\"https://www.wikihow.com/Image:Build-Your-Personal-Brand-Step-21-Version-4.jpg\" class=\"image\"><img alt=\"Build Your Personal Brand Step 21 Version 4.jpg\" src=\"https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/d/d9/Build-Your-Personal-Brand-Step-21-Version-4.jpg/aid589138-v4-728px-Build-Your-Personal-Brand-Step-21-Version-4.jpg\" decoding=\"async\" width=\"728\" height=\"546\" class=\"whcdn\" /></a>\n   </div> \n   <ul>\n    <li>Try not to spam people who give you their email address or they may block you.</li>\n   </ul></li>\n </ol> \n <h2><span class=\"mw-editsection\"><span class=\"mw-editsection-bracket\">[</span><a target=\"_blank\" href=\"https://www.wikihow.com/index.php?title=Build-Your-Personal-Brand&amp;action=edit&amp;section=6\" title=\"Edit section: Video\">Edit</a><span class=\"mw-editsection-bracket\">]</span></span><span class=\"mw-headline\" id=\"Video\">Video</span></h2> \n <h2><span class=\"mw-editsection\"><span class=\"mw-editsection-bracket\">[</span><a target=\"_blank\" href=\"https://www.wikihow.com/index.php?title=Build-Your-Personal-Brand&amp;action=edit&amp;section=7\" title=\"Edit section: Tips\">Edit</a><span class=\"mw-editsection-bracket\">]</span></span><span class=\"mw-headline\" id=\"Tips\">Tips</span></h2> \n <ul>\n  <li>Try to be as genuine as you can. People can tell if you’re trying to sell them something and may be turned off if they think you’re pretending to care about something.</li> \n  <li>Remember that even if you change jobs or even careers, you can still carry your personal brand with you into new industries and experiences.</li>\n </ul> \n <h2><span class=\"mw-editsection\"><span class=\"mw-editsection-bracket\">[</span><a target=\"_blank\" href=\"https://www.wikihow.com/index.php?title=Build-Your-Personal-Brand&amp;action=edit&amp;section=8\" title=\"Edit section: Related wikiHows\">Edit</a><span class=\"mw-editsection-bracket\">]</span></span><span class=\"mw-headline\" id=\"Related-wikiHows\">Related wikiHows</span></h2> \n <ul>\n  <li><a target=\"_blank\" href=\"https://www.wikihow.com/Monitor-Your-Online-Reputation\" title=\"Monitor Your Online Reputation\">Monitor Your Online Reputation</a></li> \n  <li><a target=\"_blank\" href=\"https://www.wikihow.com/Build-a-Brand\" title=\"Build a Brand\">Build a Brand</a></li> \n  <li><a target=\"_blank\" href=\"https://www.wikihow.com/Build-an-Artistic-Brand\" title=\"Build an Artistic Brand\">Build an Artistic Brand</a></li> \n  <li><a target=\"_blank\" href=\"https://www.wikihow.com/Create-a-Brand-Positioning-for-a-Small-Business\" title=\"Create a Brand Positioning for a href=\"https://www.wikihow.com/index.php?title=Build-Your-Personal-Brand&amp;action=edit&amp;section=9\" title=\"Edit section: References\">Edit</a><span rx10/cdn68@2020_1/2020/09/16/05-04-07-414_4830efff89b740e9.webp","https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/5/5f/Build-Your-Personal-Brand-Step-15-Version-5.jpg/aid589138-v4-728px-Build-Your-Personal-Brand-Step-15-Version-5.jpg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx19/cdn15@2020_2/2020/09/16/05-04-10-607_b2915e294ae363ac.webp","https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/1/17/Build-Your-Personal-Brand-Step-16-Version-5.jpg/aid589138-v4-728px-Build-Your-Personal-Brand-Step-16-Version-5.jpg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx18/cdn75@2020_1/2020/09/16/05-04-09-518_c03546ed4f80b99d.webp","https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/2/2b/Build-Your-Personal-Brand-Step-17-Version-5.jpg/aid589138-v4-728px-Build-Your-Personal-Brand-Step-17-Version-5.jpg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx25/cdn76@2020_3/2020/09/16/05-04-07-243_44a5b0122b748035.webp","https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/e/ea/Build-Your-Personal-Brand-Step-18-Version-5.jpg/aid589138-v4-728px-Build-Your-Personal-Brand-Step-18-Version-5.jpg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx6/cdn80@2020_5/2020/09/16/05-04-12-868_47572ea6d558fc01.webp","https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/e/ea/Build-Your-Personal-Brand-Step-19-Version-5.jpg/aid589138-v4-728px-Build-Your-Personal-Brand-Step-19-Version-5.jpg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx11/cdn40@2020_3/2020/09/16/05-04-10-882_5119fbd5f3f0dae4.webp","https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/7/7d/Build-Your-Personal-Brand-Step-20-Version-5.jpg/aid589138-v4-728px-Build-Your-Personal-Brand-Step-20-Version-5.jpg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx8/cdn15@2020_3/2020/09/16/05-04-08-331_2bf49d6c35283af5.webp","https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/d/d9/Build-Your-Personal-Brand-Step-21-Version-4.jpg/aid589138-v4-728px-Build-Your-Personal-Brand-Step-21-Version-4.jpg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx32/cdn4@2020_4/2020/09/16/05-04-13-034_1e6a836ab2b0ee89.webp"},"publishedOrCreatedDate":1600232627605},{"createdTime":"2020-09-16 13:03:47","updatedTime":"2020-09-16 13:03:47","title":"How to Find Good Exercises for Your Kids to Do Online","link":"https://www.wikihow.com/Find-Good-Exercises-for-Your-Kids-to-Do-Online","description":"<div class=\"mw-parser-output\">\n <p>It's common to have some difficulty getting your kids to exercise, especially if they’re stuck at home during the COVID-19 outbreak. Thankfully, there are plenty of online exercise resources for children of all ages and interests. Once you pin down your kids’ interests and fitness needs, you can choose fun, engaging videos and sites to keep them active at home. </p> \n <h2><span class=\"mw-editsection\"><span class=\"mw-editsection-bracket\">[</span><a target=\"_blank\" href=\"https://www.wikihow.com/index.php?title=Find-Good-Exercises-for-Your-Kids-to-Do-Online&amp;action=edit&amp;section=1\" title=\"Edit section: Steps\">Edit</a><span class=\"mw-editsection-bracket\">]</span></span><span class=\"mw-headline\" id=\"Steps\">Steps</span></h2> \n <h3><span class=\"mw-editsection\"><span class=\"mw-editsection-bracket\">[</span><a target=\"_blank\" href=\"https://www.wikihow.com/index.php?title=Find-Good-Exercises-for-Your-Kids-to-Do-Online&amp;action=edit&amp;section=2\" title=\"Edit section: Kids under Age 5\">Edit</a><span class=\"mw-editsection-bracket\">]</span></span><span class=\"mw-headline\" id=\"Kids-under-Age-5\">Kids under Age 5</span></h3> \n <ol>\n  <li>Encourage toddlers and young kids to be active for at least 3 hours. Note that kids under the age of 5 have a lot of energy to burn, and need to be active and play throughout the day. Thankfully, simple exercises like dancing or hopping around qualify as exercise for your young child, as long as they keep active.<sup id=\"_ref-1\" class=\"reference\" aria-label=\"Link to Reference 1\"><a target=\"_blank\" href=\"https://www.wikihow.com/Find-Good-Exercises-for-Your-Kids-to-Do-Online#_note-1\">[1]</a></sup>\n   <div class=\"mwimg  largeimage  floatcenter \" style=\"max-width:728px\">\n    <a target=\"_blank\" href=\"https://www.wikihow.com/Image:Find-Good-Exercises-for-Your-Kids-to-Do-Online-Step-1.jpg\" class=\"image\"><img alt=\"Find Good Exercises for Your Kids to Do Online Step 1.jpg\" src=\"https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/4/46/Find-Good-Exercises-for-Your-Kids-to-Do-Online-Step-1.jpg/aid12069015-v4-728px-Find-Good-Exercises-for-Your-Kids-to-Do-Online-Step-1.jpg\" decoding=\"async\" width=\"728\" height=\"546\" class=\"whcdn\" /></a>\n   </div> \n   <ul>\n    <li>For instance, toddlers and young children can get exercise through simple activities, like dancing, bouncing or skipping around, and playing basic games, like tag or hide-and-seek.</li>\n   </ul></li> \n  <li>Choose simple activities that appeal to toddlers and young kids. Keep in mind that little ones thrive with simple activities that allow them to move around freely, like a game of tag, hopping around, or tossing a ball back and forth. Note that really young kids don’t have the understanding or attention span needed for most group activities, like soccer, baseball, and other sports.<sup id=\"_ref-2\" class=\"reference\" aria-label=\"Link to Reference 2\"><a target=\"_blank\" href=\"https://www.wikihow.com/Find-Good-Exercises-for-Your-Kids-to-Do-Online#_note-2\">[2]</a></sup>\n   <div class=\"mwimg  largeimage  floatcenter \" style=\"max-width:728px\">\n    <a target=\"_blank\" href=\"https://www.wikihow.com/Image:Find-Good-Exercises-for-Your-Kids-to-Do-Online-Step-2.jpg\" class=\"image\"><img alt=\"Find Good Exercises for Your Kids to Do Online Step 2.jpg\" src=\"https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/8/89/Find-Good-Exercises-for-Your-Kids-to-Do-Online-Step-2.jpg/aid12069015-v4-728px-Find-Good-Exercises-for-Your-Kids-to-Do-Online-Step-2.jpg\" decoding=\"async\" width=\"728\" height=\"546\" class=\"whcdn\" /></a>\n   </div> \n   <ul>\n    <li>For instance, a simple activity, like dancing around the room, would be better for your kid than trying to teach them tennis or basketball.</li> \n    <li>If you can make exercise more fun, your kids will be more motivated to be active.<sup id=\"_ref-3\" class=\"reference\" aria-label=\"Link to Reference 3\"><a target=\"_blank\" href=\"https://www.wikihow.com/Find-Good-Exercises-for-Your-Kids-to-Do-Online#_note-3\">[3]</a></sup></li>\n   </ul></li> \n  <li>Put on a themed workout video to keep your kids moving. Search online for active, kid-themed workouts with a fun theme, like Ninjas or special cartoon characters. Invite your little ones to move and groove along with the videos, which will help them get some valuable exercise.<sup id=\"_ref-4\" class=\"reference\" aria-label=\"Link to Reference 4\"><a target=\"_blank\" href=\"https://www.wikihow.com/Find-Good-Exercises-for-Your-Kids-to-Do-Online#_note-4\">[4]</a></sup>\n   <div class=\"mwimg  largeimage  floatcenter \" style=\"max-width:728px\">\n    <a target=\"_blank\" href=\"https://www.wikihow.com/Image:Find-Good-Exercises-for-Your-Kids-to-Do-Online-Step-3.jpg\" class=\"image\"><img alt=\"Find Good Exercises for Your Kids to Do Online Step 3.jpg\" src=\"https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/d/d8/Find-Good-Exercises-for-Your-Kids-to-Do-Online-Step-3.jpg/aid12069015-v4-728px-Find-Good-Exercises-for-Your-Kids-to-Do-Online-Step-3.jpg\" decoding=\"async\" width=\"728\" height=\"546\" class=\"whcdn\" /></a>\n   </div> \n   <ul>\n    <li>For instance, NinjaZone MoveIt Mornings and Get Moving with Disney Family are great options to consider.</li>\n   </ul></li> \n  <li>Queue up some engaging, energetic exercise videos for young kids. Search for popular YouTube channels and other independent exercise programs geared towards really young kids. Look for videos and series that involve creative storytelling, fun movements, and musical numbers that will really engage your little ones.<sup id=\"_ref-5\" class=\"reference\" aria-label=\"Link to Reference 5\"><a target=\"_blank\" href=\"https://www.wikihow.com/Find-Good-Exercises-for-Your-Kids-to-Do-Online#_note-5\">[5]</a></sup>\n   <div class=\"mwimg  largeimage  floatcenter \" style=\"max-width:728px\">\n    <a target=\"_blank\" href=\"https://www.wikihow.com/Image:Find-Good-Exercises-for-Your-Kids-to-Do-Online-Step-4.jpg\" class=\"image\"><img alt=\"Find Good Exercises for Your Kids to Do Online Step 4.jpg\" src=\"https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/c/ca/Find-Good-Exercises-for-Your-Kids-to-Do-Online-Step-4.jpg/aid12069015-v4-728px-Find-Good-Exercises-for-Your-Kids-to-Do-Online-Step-4.jpg\" decoding=\"async\" width=\"728\" height=\"546\" class=\"whcdn\" /></a>\n   </div> \n   <ul>\n    <li>Cosmic Kids Yoga, Movement for Kids with Jaime, Pancake Manor, Fitness Blender, and Go Noodle: Good Energy are great options to consider for this.</li>\n   </ul></li> \n  <li>Unwind with guided yoga classes for your young ones. Invite your kids to stretch out and follow along with some simple yoga moves. If needed, help your kids follow the guided video so they can follow along.<sup id=\"_ref-6\" class=\"reference\" aria-label=\"Link to Reference 6\"><a target=\"_blank\" href=\"https://www.wikihow.com/Find-Good-Exercises-for-Your-Kids-to-Do-Online#_note-6\">[6]</a></sup>\n   <div class=\"mwimg  largeimage  floatcenter \" style=\"max-width:728px\">\n    <a target=\"_blank\" href=\"https://www.wikihow.com/Image:Find-Good-Exercises-for-Your-Kids-to-Do-Online-Step-5.jpg\" class=\"image\"><img alt=\"Find Good Exercises for Your Kids to Do Online Step 5.jpg\" src=\"https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/d/df/Find-Good-Exercises-for-Your-Kids-to-Do-Online-Step-5.jpg/aid12069015-v4-728px-Find-Good-Exercises-for-Your-Kids-to-Do-Online-Step-5.jpg\" decoding=\"async\" width=\"728\" height=\"546\" class=\"whcdn\" /></a>\n   </div> \n   <ul>\n    <li>For instance, Well Soul Fitness FriYay Classes host special yoga classes on Monday.</li>\n   </ul></li> \n  <li>Purchase online classes geared toward simple, energetic activities. Search online for simple, active workouts that your kid can follow along with. Keep in mind that many of these classes may not be a great option for toddlers, but could be an option for a 4 or 5-year old child. Try to get a feel for what sorts of activities your child is into, like martial arts or ballet, before purchasing any subscriptions.<sup id=\"_ref-7\" class=\"reference\" aria-label=\"Link to Reference 7\"><a target=\"_blank\" href=\"https://www.wikihow.com/Find-Good-Exercises-for-Your-Kids-to-Do-Online#_note-7\">[7]</a></sup>\n   <div class=\"mwimg  largeimage  floatcenter \" style=\"max-width:728px\">\n    <a target=\"_blank\" href=\"https://www.wikihow.com/Image:Find-Good-Exercises-for-Your-Kids-to-Do-Online-Step-6.jpg\" class=\"image\"><img alt=\"Find Good Exercises for Your Kids to Do Online Step 6.jpg\" src=\"https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/3/3d/Find-Good-Exercises-for-Your-Kids-to-Do-Online-Step-6.jpg/aid12069015-v4-728px-Find-Good-Exercises-for-Your-Kids-to-Do-Online-Step-6.jpg\" decoding=\"async\" width=\"728\" height=\"546\" class=\"whcdn\" /></a>\n   </div> \n   <ul>\n    <li>For instance, Activity Hero is a great place to start.</li>\n   </ul></li>\n </ol> \n <h3><span class=\"mw-editsection\"><span class=\"mw-editsection-bracket\">[</span><a target=\"_blank\" href=\"https://www.wikihow.com/index.php?title=Find-Good-Exercises-for-Your-Kids-to-Do-Online&amp;action=edit&amp;section=3\" title=\"Edit section: Elementary, Middle, and High School Kids\">Edit</a><span class=\"mw-editsection-bracket\">]</span></span><span id=\"Elementary,-Middle,-and-High-School-Kids\"></span><span class=\"mw-headline\" id=\"Elementary.2C-Middle.2C-and-High-School-Kids\">Elementary, Middle, and High School Kids</span></h3> \n <ol>\n  <li>Remind kids between ages 5 and 18 to get 1 hour of exercise each day. Keep in mind that grade-school kids and teenagers don’t need quite as much daily exercise as toddlers, though they still need to stay active throughout the day. Thankfully, older kids can handle more complex sports and hobbies.<sup id=\"_ref-8\" class=\"reference\" aria-label=\"Link to Reference 8\"><a target=\"_blank\" href=\"https://www.wikihow.com/Find-Good-Exercises-for-Your-Kids-to-Do-Online#_note-8\">[8]</a></sup>\n   <div class=\"mwimg  largeimage  floatcenter \" style=\"max-width:728px\">\n    <a target=\"_blank\" href=\"https://www.wikihow.com/Image:Find-Good-Exercises-for-Your-Kids-to-Do-Online-Step-7.jpg\" class=\"image\"><img alt=\"Find Good Exercises for Your Kids to Do Online Step 7.jpg\" src=\"https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/0/0e/Find-Good-Exercises-for-Your-Kids-to-Do-Online-Step-7.jpg/aid12069015-v4-728px-Find-Good-Exercises-for-Your-Kids-to-Do-Online-Step-7.jpg\" decoding=\"async\" width=\"728\" height=\"546\" class=\"whcdn\" /></a>\n   </div> \n   <ul>\n    <li>For instance, older kids can more seriously pursue different hobbies and sports, like ballet, karate, and gymnastics.</li> \n    <li>Try to create a routine where you get exercise at about the same time each day. For instance, if you want your kids to work out in the morning, try laying out their exercise clothes at night before they go to bed.<sup id=\"_ref-9\" class=\"reference\" aria-label=\"Link to Reference 9\"><a target=\"_blank\" href=\"https://www.wikihow.com/Find-Good-Exercises-for-Your-Kids-to-Do-Online#_note-9\">[9]</a></sup></li>\n   </ul></li> \n  <li>Search for fitness videos geared toward your child's age. Look for videos and programs that relate to more specific exercises. Pick out exercise videos that teach your kids specific techniques, like squats and planks, or programs that incorporate engaging music and dance sequences. Play different videos and see if any of them really resonate with your kids.<sup id=\"_ref-10\" class=\"reference\" aria-label=\"Link to Reference 10\"><a target=\"_blank\" href=\"https://www.wikihow.com/Find-Good-Exercises-for-Your-Kids-to-Do-Online#_note-10\">[10]</a></sup>\n   <div class=\"mwimg  largeimage  floatcenter \" style=\"max-width:728px\">\n    <a target=\"_blank\" href=\"https://www.wikihow.com/Image:Find-Good-Exercises-for-Your-Kids-to-Do-Online-Step-8.jpg\" class=\"image\"><img alt=\"Find Good Exercises for Your Kids to Do Online Step 8.jpg\" src=\"https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/5/5b/Find-Good-Exercises-for-Your-Kids-to-Do-Online-Step-8.jpg/aid12069015-v4-728px-Find-Good-Exercises-for-Your-Kids-to-Do-Online-Step-8.jpg\" decoding=\"async\" width=\"728\" height=\"546\" class=\"whcdn\" /></a>\n   </div> \n   <ul>\n    <li>Programs and videos like Family Fitness with Wes, Double Time, P.E. with Joe, Obé Fitness Kids, Alo Yoga Kids Yoga &amp; Meditation, and Shaun T’s Fit Kids Club “Cool Moves” are all nice choices to consider.</li>\n   </ul></li> \n  <li>Help your athletic kids stay in shape with conditioning videos. Look for videos that will help your kids make the most of their downtime, even if they’re stuck at home. Specific websites and organizations cater to young athletes, providing exercises and workouts that help build your child’s strength and stamina.<sup id=\"_ref-11\" class=\"reference\" aria-label=\"Link to Reference 11\"><a target=\"_blank\" href=\"https://www.wikihow.com/Find-Good-Exercises-for-Your-Kids-to-Do-Online#_note-11\">[11]</a></sup>\n   <div class=\"mwimg  largeimage  floatcenter \" style=\"max-width:728px\">\n    <a target=\"_blank\" href=\"https://www.wikihow.com/Image:Find-Good-Exercises-for-Your-Kids-to-Do-Online-Step-9.jpg\" class=\"image\"><img alt=\"Find Good Exercises for Your Kids to Do Online Step 9.jpg\" src=\"https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/5/5a/Find-Good-Exercises-for-Your-Kids-to-Do-Online-Step-9.jpg/aid12069015-v4-728px-Find-Good-Exercises-for-Your-Kids-to-Do-Online-Step-9.jpg\" decoding=\"async\" width=\"728\" height=\"546\" class=\"whcdn\" /></a>\n   </div> \n   <ul>\n    <li>ActiveKids.com, StandUp Kids, Tabata Workout from HASfit, and videos from the International Youth Conditioning Association are great resources to check out.</li>\n   </ul></li> \n  <li>Sign your kids up for free fitness classes. Search online for a variety of different sports classes and other activities, ranging from ballet class to sports-specific training videos. Look for websites or programs that archive their videos, so you can view them at a later time.<sup id=\"_ref-12\" class=\"reference\" aria-label=\"Link to Reference 12\"><a target=\"_blank\" href=\"https://www.wikihow.com/Find-Good-Exercises-for-Your-Kids-to-Do-Online#_note-12\">[12]</a></sup>\n   <div class=\"mwimg  largeimage  floatcenter \" style=\"max-width:728px\">\n    <a target=\"_blank\" href=\"https://www.wikihow.com/Image:Find-Good-Exercises-for-Your-Kids-to-Do-Online-Step-10.jpg\" class=\"image\"><img alt=\"Find Good Exercises for Your Kids to Do Online Step 10.jpg\" src=\"https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/3/33/Find-Good-Exercises-for-Your-Kids-to-Do-Online-Step-10.jpg/aid12069015-v4-728px-Find-Good-Exercises-for-Your-Kids-to-Do-Online-Step-10.jpg\" decoding=\"async\" width=\"728\" height=\"546\" class=\"whcdn\" /></a>\n   </div> \n   <ul>\n    <li>For instance, Get Moving with Disney Family archives their videos, as do GO with YOYO and Starcoach.</li>\n   </ul></li> \n  <li>Purchase online classes for specific sports and physical activities. Think about what your kids are really interested in—are they hoping to learn a specific sport or activity? Look for online classes that help kids learn the ropes of certain activities, like ballet, martial arts, or other activities. Keep in mind that many of these classes cost money, depending on the program or activity you’re signing up for.<sup id=\"_ref-13\" class=\"reference\" aria-label=\"Link to Reference 13\"><a target=\"_blank\" href=\"https://www.wikihow.com/Find-Good-Exercises-for-Your-Kids-to-Do-Online#_note-13\">[13]</a></sup>\n   <div class=\"mwimg  largeimage  floatcenter \" style=\"max-width:728px\">\n    <a target=\"_blank\" href=\"https://www.wikihow.com/Image:Find-Good-Exercises-for-Your-Kids-to-Do-Online-Step-11.jpg\" class=\"image\"><img alt=\"Find Good Exercises for Your Kids to Do Online Step 11.jpg\" src=\"https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/f/fd/Find-Good-Exercises-for-Your-Kids-to-Do-Online-Step-11.jpg/aid12069015-v4-728px-Find-Good-Exercises-for-Your-Kids-to-Do-Online-Step-11.jpg\" decoding=\"async\" width=\"728\" height=\"546\" class=\"whcdn\" /></a>\n   </div> \n   <ul>\n    <li>Activity Hero is a company that offers a large variety of online sports classes.</li> \n    <li>Look up specific online classes in a search engine and see what you come up with.</li>\n   </ul></li>\n </ol> \n <h2><span class=\"mw-editsection\"><span class=\"mw-editsection-bracket\">[</span><a target=\"_blank\" href=\"https://www.wikihow.com/index.php?title=Find-Good-Exercises-for-Your-Kids-to-Do-Online&amp;action=edit&amp;section=4\" title=\"Edit section: Tips\">Edit</a><span class=\"mw-editsection-bracket\">]</span></span><span class=\"mw-headline\" id=\"Tips\">Tips</span></h2> \n <ul>\n  <li>Don’t feel like your kids need to meet their daily exercise quota all at once, especially if your household has a busy schedule. Instead, encourage your children to break up their exercise into smaller, more manageable chunks.<sup id=\"_ref-14\" class=\"reference\" aria-label=\"Link to Reference 14\"><a target=\"_blank\" href=\"https://www.wikihow.com/Find-Good-Exercises-for-Your-Kids-to-Do-Online#_note-14\">[14]</a></sup></li> \n  <li>Look for other ways to work activity into your day, as well. For instance, you might take the stairs instead of the elevator, or you might park farther away from the door to get in a few more steps.<sup id=\"_ref-15\" class=\"reference\" aria-label=\"Link to Reference 15\"><a target=\"_blank\" href=\"https://www.wikihow.com/Find-Good-Exercises-for-Your-Kids-to-Do-Online#_note-15\">[15]</a></sup></li>\n </ul> \n <h2><span class=\"mw-editsection\"><span class=\"mw-editsection-bracket\">[</span><a target=\"_blank\" href=\"https://www.wikihow.com/index.php?title=Find-Good-Exercises-for-Your-Kids-to-Do-Online&amp;action=edit&amp;section=5\" title=\"Edit section: References\">Edit</a><span class=\"mw-editsection-bracket\">]</span></span><span class=\"mw-headline\" id=\"References\">References</span></h2>\n <div class=\"mw-references-wrap
